hero.subtitle: Your personal guide in the world of fragrances. Discover, explore and define your unique olfactory signature.

story.label: The Philosophy
story.title: Scent is the memory that defies oblivion

ba.title: Ba
ba.description: The part of the spirit that travels between worlds, representing the unique and unrepeatable essence of each individual.

aura.title: Aura
aura.description: The distinctive atmosphere that emanates from a person, their invisible energy that leaves a mark on those who perceive it.

story.paragraph1: For the ancient Egyptians, fragrances were sacred vehicles for the journey to the afterlife. They believed that scent had the power to transcend the physical realm.
story.paragraph2: was born from this timeless truth: fragrance is the architect of memory. A familiar scent can instantly transport you to a specific moment, place, or person.
story.paragraph3: Our mission is to help you define that essence. To design the olfactory signature that captures your soul and projects your energy, ensuring you remain unforgettable.

pyramid.label: Olfactory Science
pyramid.title: The Olfactory Pyramid
pyramid.subtitle: Each fragrance is composed of three layers that gradually reveal themselves, creating a sensory experience that evolves over time.

top.name: Top
top.subtitle: Top Notes
top.description: The first impression. Fresh and volatile aromas like citrus and aquatic notes that capture attention in the first 15-30 minutes.

heart.name: Heart
heart.subtitle: Heart Notes
heart.description: The soul of the fragrance. Floral, green and fruity aromas that emerge when the top notes fade.

base.name: Base
base.subtitle: Base Notes
base.description: The lasting signature. Deep notes of woods, amber and spices that linger for hours, defining the final character.

families.label: The 9 Families
families.title: Olfactory Families
families.subtitle: Each olfactory family has a unique personality. Discover which one resonates with your essence.
families.exploreAll: Explore all 9 olfactory families in the app

citrus.name: Citrus
citrus.description: Fresh, energizing and light fragrances based on citrus fruits.

floral.name: Floral
floral.description: Romantic and delicate perfumes dominated by fresh flowers.

fruity.name: Fruity
fruity.description: Sweet and juicy fragrances with fresh and ripe fruit aromas.

woody.name: Woody
woody.description: Warm and sophisticated perfumes with dry and resinous wood notes.

oriental.name: Oriental
oriental.description: Intense and exotic fragrances with warm and spicy touches.

spicy.name: Spicy
spicy.description: Warm and piquant perfumes with exotic spice aromas.

aquatic.name: Aquatic
aquatic.description: Fresh and light fragrances that evoke the sea breeze.

green.name: Green
green.description: Fresh and herbal aromas reminiscent of fresh leaves and gardens.

gourmand.name: Gourmand
gourmand.description: Sweet and warm perfumes inspired by desserts and delicious foods.

features.label: Features
features.title: Your Aromatic Journey
features.subtitle: Tools designed to transform how you discover, organize and enjoy fragrances.

explore.title: Exploration

section1.title: 1. Data Controller
section1.content: Baura is a project developed by an individual residing in Spain. For any privacy-related inquiries, you can contact us at:

section2.title: 2. Data We Collect
section2.intro: Through this website and the Baura application, we may collect:
section2.item1: Contact data: Name and email when you write to us through the contact form.
section2.item2: App usage data: Olfactory preferences, perfume collection and ratings that you voluntarily enter in the application.
section2.item3: Technical data: Anonymous information about the device and application usage to improve the service.

section3.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
section3.item1: Respond to your inquiries and contact requests.
section3.item2: Provide you with personalized fragrance recommendations.
section3.item3: Improve the application and user experience.
section3.item4: Comply with legal obligations when necessary.

section4.title: 4. Legal Basis
section4.content: The processing of your data is based on your consent when using the application and sending us communications, as well as our legitimate interest in improving the service.

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.content: We retain your data while you maintain an active account in the application or while necessary to respond to your inquiries. Contact data is deleted 12 months after the last communication.

section6.title: 6. Data Sharing
section6.intro: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for commercial purposes. We may only share information with:
section6.item1: Technical service providers necessary for the app's operation (hosting, email).
section6.item2: Public authorities when there is a legal obligation.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to:
section7.item1: Access: Know what data we have about you.
section7.item3: Erasure: Request the deletion of your data.
section7.item4: Portability: Receive your data in a structured format.
section7.item5: Objection: Object to the processing of your data.
section7.outro: To exercise these rights, write to us at
section7.responseTime: We will respond within a maximum of 30 days.

section8.title: 8. Security
section8.content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss or alteration. However, no system is completely secure and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of information.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
section9.content: We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through the application or by email. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.

section10.title: 10. Contact and Complaints
section10.claimIntro: If you believe your rights have not been properly addressed, you can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD):

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.intro: Baura is a free application that helps you discover and organize fragrances. The service includes:
section2.item1: Personalized perfume recommendations based on your preferences.
section2.item2: Management of your personal fragrance collection.
section2.item3: Information about olfactory families and notes.
section2.item4: Tools to explore the world of perfumery.

section3.title: 3. Project Nature
section3.content: Baura is a personal project developed by an individual in Spain. It is not a company or commercial entity. The application is offered free of charge and non-profit, as a tool for perfumery enthusiasts.

section4.title: 4. Permitted Use
section4.intro: You agree to use Baura responsibly and legally. The following is prohibited:
section4.item1: Using the service for illegal or unauthorized purposes.
section4.item2: Attempting to access unauthorized systems or data.

section5.title: 5. Content and Recommendations
